generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Titillium+Web&display=swap");@keyframes appear{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(-500px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes jump{0%{transform:translateY(0)}50%{transform:translateY(-20px)}to{transform:translateX(0)}}*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;scroll-behavior:smooth}body{font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;line-height:1.5;font-size:17px;min-height:100%}b{font-weight:700}p{font-weight:400}h2{font-size:2rem;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0}h4{font-size:1rem;font-family:Titillium Web,sans-serif}.container{width:100%}.row{max-width:1200px;margin:auto;padding:85px 25px}.txt-center{text-align:center;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.flex{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-gap:50px}.column__image img{width:100%}.fixed{position:fixed!important;right:25px}header{position:relative;min-height:500px;height:100vh;height:calc(var(--vh, 1vh)*100)}.header-wrapper{background:#be1d2c}nav{position:relative;background:#000}nav .nav-wrapper{background:#000;display:flex;height:70px;box-sizing:border-box;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:0 20px;z-index:2;max-width:1200px;margin:auto}nav .nav-wrapper a.logo img{width:80px}nav .nav-wrapper a.logo{width:80px;height:54px}nav .nav-wrapper .mobile-menu{display:flex!important}nav .nav-wrapper ul{list-style-type:none;padding:0;display:none;text-align:center;bottom:0;background:#000;position:fixed;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:1;margin:0 0 0 -20px}nav .nav-wrapper li{float:left;line-height:15vh}nav .nav-wrapper li a{display:block;color:#fff;text-align:center;padding:14px 16px;text-decoration:none;font-family:Titillium Web,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700}nav .nav-wrapper li a:hover{color:#be1d2c}#hamburger{width:60px;height:32px;z-index:2;-webkit-transition:.5s ease-in-out;-moz-transition:.5s ease-in-out;-o-transition:.5s ease-in-out;transition:.5s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer}#hamburger,#hamburger span{display:block;-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);-moz-transform:rotate(0deg);-o-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)}#hamburger span{position:absolute;height:5px;width:100%;background:#be1d2c;border-radius:9px;opacity:1;left:0;-webkit-transition:.25s ease-in-out;-moz-transition:.25s ease-in-out;-o-transition:.25s ease-in-out;transition:.25s ease-in-out}#hamburger span:first-child{top:0}#hamburger span:nth-child(2){top:14px}#hamburger span:nth-child(3){top:28px}#hamburger.open span:first-child{top:14px;-webkit-transform:rotate(135deg);-moz-transform:rotate(135deg);-o-transform:rotate(135deg);transform:rotate(135deg)}#hamburger.open span:nth-child(2){opacity:0;left:-60px}#hamburger.open span:nth-child(3){top:14px;-webkit-transform:rotate(-135deg);-moz-transform:rotate(-135deg);-o-transform:rotate(-135deg);transform:rotate(-135deg)}.header__hero{height:calc(100% - 70px);background-color:rgba(190,29,44,.75)}.header__hero__text h2{font-family:Titillium Web,sans-serif;font-size:2rem;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:800;line-height:1}.header__hero__text h4{font-size:1.5rem;color:#efefef;font-weight:300}.header__hero:before{content:"";position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;top:0;left:0;z-index:-1}.header__hero__mainpage:before{background:url(3fdfe64ce7d466f7ff55fe1201c139df.jpg) no-repeat 50%/cover}.header__hero__festool:before{background:url(f263cce5e01d42e2d07a6727e688cc7b.jpg) no-repeat 50%/cover}.underline:after{content:"";height:4px;width:200px;background-color:#be1d2c;display:flex;border-radius:10px;margin-bottom:25px}.icons{bottom:0;position:absolute;margin-bottom:25px;color:#fff;animation-name:appear;animation-duration:1s;animation-delay:.3s;animation-fill-mode:both;animation-timing-function:ease-out}.icons a{color:#fff;text-decoration-color:#fff}.opening,.phone{display:flex;align-items:center;margin-bottom:25px}.opening p,.phone p{font-size:25px;padding-left:20px;font-family:Titillium Web,sans-serif}#tikurilla{background-color:#5a5a5a}#tikurilla img:first-child{width:250px}#tikurilla p{color:#efefef;margin-top:25px}#festool{background-color:#efefef;color:#5a5a5a}#festool img:first-child{width:250px;margin-bottom:25px}.header__arrowdown{position:absolute;bottom:20px}.jump{animation-name:jump;animation-duration:1s;animation-delay:.3s;animation-fill-mode:both;animation-timing-function:ease-in-out;animation-iteration-count:infinite}.header__logo{margin-top:25px;max-width:300px}img.row__images{width:100%;border-radius:20px}#contact
